result.name: bus-service-operators-grant-claims
result.notes: Database held on ETHOS used to calculate Bus Service Operators Grant for payment to bus operators. Operator details held are company address, vendor number, contact telephone number and email address. Claim details include service kilometres, fuel consumption and amount of grant to be paid and date of payment.

organization.name: department-for-transport
organization.title: Department for Transport
organization.description:
We work with our agencies and partners to support the transport network that helps the UK’s businesses and gets people and goods travelling around the country. We plan and invest in transport infrastructure to keep the UK on the move.

DFT is a ministerial department, supported by 22 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport

result.title: Bus Service Operators Grant Claims

extras.value: The certified payment amounts made to each operator is available on the DfT website. http://assets.dft.gov.uk/publications/bsog-grants-paid-to-20120331/bsog-grants-paid-2011.
